name: Giant Puffball
description: The Giant Puffball (Calvatia gigantea) is one of the largest mushrooms in the world and can reach diameters of up to one meter and weights of 15 kg. The spherical, white fruiting body grows on meadows, in parks and at forest edges. When young and white inside, it is an excellent edible mushroom. Historically it was used as wound dressing and contains the antitumor protein calvacin.
